Text: RE S Credits Cc Jeff I have attached all the entries related to the sale of the SO credits I have also attached an example of buy and sell of credits Let me know if you have any questions Thanks Olga Original Message From Prejean Frank Sent Monday October AM To Herrera Olga White Nicole Cc Loukanis Linda K Subject FW S Credits Original Message From Loukanis Linda K Sent Monday October PM To Prejean Frank Cc Schultz Michelle Subject FW S Credits You seem to speak this language What is he talking about Original Message From Herrold Jeff Sent Monday October PM To Schultz Michelle Cc Loukanis Linda K Seade Jerry Subject RE S Credits Do we have a summary of the accounting entries made to report the sale For tax close this Wednesday well have to reverse the book realized gain on company R and calculate taxes on the tax gain Please provide a schedule identifying the total proceeds and SAP entries used to reverse the MTM and report the realized book gain Thanks
